1329000.name: 最后一个冬天
1329000.description:
Project Human takes you to a human research center where artificial intelligence controls everything. It follows your every move and will always remind you how stupid and useless you are.

AI has set up a series of different puzzles and platforms for you to complete. But you are not here to stay, you want to escape. Things won't go in a way they were supposed to. This results in to events that none of us could have even imagined.

In Project Human you will always be surprised. Do not trust anything you see as what even is real, are you real? Who knows, only the game will tell.

You can play alone or with your friend in a cooperative campaing.

Game is heavily under production and you can follow it from YouTube on CraxyTheDev channel.
1329000.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
